storyInfo: Aroma receives invitations from various Rhodes Island departments. Thanks to her day-to-day work, she discovers a hidden crisis aboard Rhodes Island which influences her decision.

attributes.content: Aroma, this is to notify you that you have passed the evaluation period.
attributes.name: HR Operator

attributes.content: The Recruitment and Assessment Section's application records show that due to your excellent performance, you've also received invitations from other departments.
attributes.name: HR Operator

attributes.content: That said, you will get to decide which department to join.
attributes.name: HR Operator

attributes.content: When will I have to make my decision by?
attributes.name: Aroma

attributes.content: You just have to let me know by the end of the week.
attributes.name: HR Operator

attributes.content: Choose carefully.
attributes.name: HR Operator

attributes.content: ...Okay.
attributes.name: Aroma

attributes.content: I'll think it over. Thanks.
attributes.name: Aroma

attributes.content: Rubber, what's going on? The laundry room's under maintenance again?
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Operator A

attributes.content: Sorry! The laundry machines malfunctioned. Sorry about the trouble.
attributes.name: Rubber

attributes.content: Logistics and Engineering will have it fixed as soon as possible, and we'll make an announcement about when it'll be open again.
attributes.name: Rubber

attributes.content: But I was in the line for so long...
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Operator A

attributes.content: Alright, alright. These things happen. Let's just head back.
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Operator B

attributes.content: Sorry, we'll try to get it fixed ASAP.
attributes.name: Rubber

attributes.content: *sigh*...
attributes.name: Rubber

attributes.content: Look at the time. Where's Aroma?
attributes.name: Rubber

attributes.content: She's not here to help with the laundry. What should I do...?
attributes.name: Rubber

attributes.content: But it'll probably give her a headache when she finds out there are so many last minute laundry orders, right?
attributes.name: Rubber

attributes.content: Oh well, work takes priority. I'll head to the dorm and see if I can find her there.
attributes.name: Rubber

attributes.content: How's the water temperature?
attributes.name: Engineering Operator

attributes.content: Can we make it a little hotter?
attributes.name: Aroma

attributes.content: And the pressure?
attributes.name: Engineering Operator

attributes.content: Hm... Pretty good. It feels really nice.
attributes.name: Aroma

attributes.content: Can you go a little higher? Right, help me with that spot there.
attributes.name: Aroma

attributes.content: Okay, I'll keep the brush at this height.
attributes.name: Engineering Operator

attributes.content: If anything feels at all off, feel free to give me a call.
attributes.name: Engineering Operator

attributes.content: Oh, okay...
attributes.name: Aroma

attributes.content: Aroma, isn't this tail hydrotherapy equipment great? It's Engineering's latest masterpiece!
attributes.name: Roberta

attributes.content: I think it's really helping.
attributes.name: Aroma

attributes.content: But is testing out the hydrotherapy machine all there is to today's seminar?
attributes.name: Aroma

attributes.content: Well, it's important. It's a product that's gonna be servicing people, so of course we need user feedback!
attributes.name: Roberta

attributes.content: Okay...
attributes.name: Aroma

attributes.content: Of course, that's just part of the seminar.
attributes.name: Roberta

attributes.content: You've been working so hard over at Logistics, Aroma. It must be tough on you, huh?
attributes.name: Roberta

attributes.content: Feel free to come relax any time you want, even after the seminars are over!
attributes.name: Roberta

attributes.content: Huh? Can I really?
attributes.name: Aroma

attributes.content: I'll stay for a little longer while it's still my lunch break, then. I'll have lots to do in the afternoon.
attributes.name: Aroma

attributes.content: You're more than welcome to. And if you have any more suggestions, all the better.
attributes.name: Roberta

attributes.content: All this R&D work is necessary for Engineering to provide everyone with even better beauty treatments.
attributes.name: Roberta

attributes.content: Um, if I remember correctly, beauty treatments should be the responsibility of Logistics.
attributes.name: Aroma

attributes.content: So why did you choose Engineering when you formally joined Rhodes Island?
attributes.name: Aroma

attributes.content: Aroma—
attributes.name: Rubber

attributes.content: ...She's not in her dorm room either... Weird. Where did she go?
attributes.name: Rubber

attributes.content: Hm? There's a copy of Hair Care and Maintenance Techniques on her desk.
attributes.name: Rubber

attributes.content: Look at all these notes... She's really been studying up on these techniques.
attributes.name: Rubber

attributes.content: Huh? Something fell out of the book... A notice about the Engineering Department's seminar?
attributes.name: Rubber

attributes.content: Wait, the Engineering Department?!
attributes.name: Rubber

attributes.content: Her trial period's almost over...
attributes.name: Rubber

attributes.content: No way... Does this mean she wants to leave Logistics?
attributes.name: Rubber

attributes.content: Hey, Rubber, is Aroma here?
attributes.name: Purestream

attributes.content: Hey, Purestream. What's wrong?
attributes.name: Rubber

attributes.content: The communal bath's scheduled for a routine cleaning today, and I wanted to ask if she has time to help out!
attributes.name: Purestream

attributes.content: The bath? Why Aroma? Isn't there somebody else in charge of cleaning that?
attributes.name: Rubber

attributes.content: Huh? A-Actually, that's me.
attributes.name: Purestream

attributes.content: Are you telling me it's not just the communal bath, but... Every single place that needs cleaning on this entire landship has been trying to get Aroma's help?!
attributes.name: Rubber

attributes.content: Not only does she help deal with oily messes after the kitchen's cooking mishaps, she also helps pick up the splinters from broken training dummies?
attributes.name: Rubber

attributes.content: She even cleans up the Convalescent Garden's baitbugs? She's terrified of bugs!
attributes.name: Rubber

attributes.content: When you put it like that, she must be way overworked...
attributes.name: Rubber

attributes.content: Hm, but she always makes it look so easy when helps out. She really helps with our efficiency.
attributes.name: Purestream

attributes.content: But...
attributes.name: Rubber

attributes.content: You know, now that I think about it, my first thought is to get her to help with the pile of dirty laundry every time the laundry room's closed for maintenance...
attributes.name: Rubber

attributes.content: *sigh*... Aroma's been the backbone of Logistics for a while now but we've never actually talked to her about joining us officially.
attributes.name: Rubber

attributes.content: She knows so much, picks everything up so quickly, and is such a meticulous hard worker... Engineering might actually be trying to poach her.
attributes.name: Rubber

attributes.content: Wait, what do you mean...?
attributes.name: Purestream

attributes.content: This won't do. I need to get the laundry orders divvied up, on the double. I can't keep loading Aroma with so much work.
attributes.name: Rubber

attributes.content: We can't afford to lose her.
attributes.name: Rubber

attributes.content: So Roberta... you chose to join Engineering because technology can help reduce everyone's workloads?
attributes.name: Aroma

attributes.content: Right. I mean, we can only do so much ourselves.
attributes.name: Roberta

attributes.content: I could be a hundred times more energetic, but I'd still never be able to give every single operator a makeover in one day, right?
attributes.name: Roberta

attributes.content: Similarly, you wouldn't be able to clean all of Rhodes Island in one day, right?
attributes.name: Roberta

attributes.content: But with an auto-modeler, or some kind of automatic cleaning machine, everybody's work gets that much easier.
attributes.name: Roberta

attributes.content: And then more operators could enjoy our services faster, right? Even getting the wait times under a day isn't out of the question.
attributes.name: Roberta

attributes.content: I want to provide a faster, more convenient service to more people. That's why.
attributes.name: Roberta

attributes.content: That's true...
attributes.name: Aroma

attributes.content: But Roberta, will these machines ultimately replace people entirely?
attributes.name: Aroma

attributes.content: Huh? Where's this coming from?
attributes.name: Roberta

attributes.content: It just suddenly occurred to me that... maybe machines would be much better at repetitive daily work than me.
attributes.name: Aroma

attributes.content: That's not how this works, Aroma.
attributes.name: Roberta

attributes.content: Although machines have been replacing people after many, many iterations, I still think they each have their own advantages.
attributes.name: Roberta

attributes.content: 'Sometimes, only a person knows why something needs to be done.'
attributes.name: Aroma

attributes.content: My grandma said something similar once.
attributes.name: Aroma

attributes.content: Oh, that reminds me. Siracusans do seem to trust human handiwork more.
attributes.name: Roberta

attributes.content: The famiglie would take an obedient carwash worker over an ice-cold set of automatic carwash equipment any day.
attributes.name: Roberta

attributes.content: Kinda brings me back.
attributes.name: Roberta

attributes.content: If I remember correctly, you were born in Siracusa too, weren't you?
attributes.name: Aroma

attributes.content: I left when I was still very young, though.
attributes.name: Aroma

attributes.content: Me too. I haven't been back for a long time.
attributes.name: Roberta

attributes.content: I've heard from our Siracusan operators that the country has changed a lot.
attributes.name: Aroma

attributes.content: So you want to go back and have a look?
attributes.name: Roberta

attributes.content: Eh?
attributes.name: Aroma

attributes.content: Oh, I just got a notification on my terminal.
attributes.name: Aroma

attributes.content: What's wrong?
attributes.name: Roberta

attributes.content: It's a schedule change notice.
attributes.name: Aroma

attributes.content: That's weird. All my work for this afternoon has been canceled.
attributes.name: Aroma

attributes.content: Is this a holiday or something...?
attributes.name: Aroma

attributes.content: Let me ask Rubber.
attributes.name: Aroma

attributes.content: Busy...? How come... Never mind.
attributes.name: Aroma

attributes.content: Since you have time, want to try another product?
attributes.name: Roberta

attributes.content: The hydrotherapy's auto mode is almost done. I also have a makeup applier while-you-sleep and a supersonic tooth cleaning machine currently under development.
attributes.name: Roberta

attributes.content: Oh, that's fine. Thank you, though.
attributes.name: Aroma

attributes.content: But there's actually something else I wanted to ask you about.
attributes.name: Aroma

attributes.content: Take a look at this.
attributes.name: Aroma

attributes.content: Is this... an application to submit an engineering blueprint?
attributes.name: Roberta

attributes.content: Yep, all the cleaning work's been reassigned. Purestream and I will help her take care of the some of the other things she was supposed to work on.
attributes.name: Rubber

attributes.content: I was surprised there was so much non-cleaning work, though. Not only does she make herbal dishes at the cafeteria, she was also scheduled to install anti-static equipment in the corridors...
attributes.name: Rubber

attributes.content: *sigh*, never mind. I'll cancel all of them for her and ask other Logistics operators to cover those.
attributes.name: Rubber

attributes.content: Next, we have the tough part.
attributes.name: Rubber

attributes.content: Hello, is Aroma here?
attributes.name: Rubber

attributes.content: Oh, she just took an engineering blueprint to Roberta.
attributes.name: Engineering Operator

attributes.content: A blueprint?
attributes.name: Rubber

attributes.content: That's right. She asked Weedy to teach her how to draw one.
attributes.name: Engineering Operator

attributes.content: I've seen her bringing all sorts of data here lately, and leaving with large stacks of blueprints.
attributes.name: Engineering Operator

attributes.content: Data...?
attributes.name: Rubber

attributes.content: That reminds me. She asked me for all these weirdly specific details about the laundry room.
attributes.name: Rubber

attributes.content: The current diameter of the piping... The maximum flux of the drainage... and something about the water usage during cycles...
attributes.name: Rubber

attributes.content: Oh no, I've been so worried about the maintenance these last couple days, I forgot all about that!
attributes.name: Rubber

attributes.content: Hold on... So she's already good friends with Weedy, one of Engineering's most senior operators?
attributes.name: Rubber

attributes.content: Weedy's always so busy, but even she's paying so much attention to Aroma. Look at me, though... Not only have I been overlooking her contributions, I even forgot about her request.
attributes.name: Rubber

attributes.content: No wonder she never talked to me about what comes after her formal employment. It's already a done deal...
attributes.name: Rubber

attributes.content: It's too late. It's all over...
attributes.name: Rubber

attributes.content: Huh?
attributes.name: Engineering Operator

attributes.content: But...
attributes.name: Engineering Operator

attributes.content: It's okay. I understand.
attributes.name: Rubber

attributes.content: I respect her decision, but at least let me do one last thing for her. After all, we've worked together at Logistics for so long now.
attributes.name: Rubber

attributes.content: Is this... an application to submit an engineering blueprint?
attributes.name: Roberta

attributes.content: Hold on, why do you have the early design drafts of the hydrotherapy machine?! It even has the magazine publisher's phone number that I scribbled on there...
attributes.name: Roberta

attributes.content: Oh, actually, I saw it over at Weedy's.
attributes.name: Aroma

attributes.content: I came because I heard about the hydrotherapy machine from her.
attributes.name: Aroma

attributes.content: Take a look at the documents in the back, too.
attributes.name: Aroma

attributes.content: A research report on the hair growth of operators of different races... This is so detailed!
attributes.name: Roberta

attributes.content: You researched all this by yourself? Amazing...
attributes.name: Roberta

attributes.content: It's all thanks to everyone's help.
attributes.name: Aroma

attributes.content: Please take a look and tell me if the improved design on the document is viable.
attributes.name: Aroma

attributes.content: Yeah, I took a look at the application. There's nothing wrong with making modifications based on the hair characteristics of different races, but the hydrotherapy machine is still in testing. It hasn't been through final inspection yet.
attributes.name: Roberta

attributes.content: Whether it can be mass-produced after the modifications, and whether it will be installed in the changing rooms and the communal bath, all depends on Closure's approval.
attributes.name: Roberta

attributes.content: No need to worry about that. I've already checked with Weedy, and there's room for new equipment in the bath.
attributes.name: Aroma

attributes.content: I'll keep working with you to test it, and there are plenty of operators willing to volunteer to test the improved version.
attributes.name: Aroma

attributes.content: ...But why go this far for this?
attributes.name: Roberta

attributes.content: This is just a beauty treatment I designed for the experiment section. How come this is so important all of a sudden...?
attributes.name: Roberta

attributes.content: What's this about, Aroma?
attributes.name: Roberta

attributes.content: Actually... Rhodes Island is going through a hair loss crisis.
attributes.name: Aroma

attributes.content: Wait, Purestream, what are you moving?
attributes.name: Aroma

attributes.content: I don't remember seeing anything like that on the trash disposal manifest...
attributes.name: Aroma

attributes.content: Huh? But I reported it!
attributes.name: Purestream

attributes.content: All of this is our operators' hair. I got it from cleaning up around the landship!
attributes.name: Purestream

attributes.content: You mean... this entire pile is hair?
attributes.name: Aroma

attributes.content: Yep! You just got here, so you probably don't know about this yet, right?
attributes.name: Purestream

attributes.content: Lots of people onboard Rhodes Island shed hair every day.
attributes.name: Purestream

attributes.content: If we don't get this taken care of promptly, it'll take over both the water pipes and the air vents!
attributes.name: Purestream

attributes.content: But this seems kinda... excessive.
attributes.name: Aroma

attributes.content: No, if anything it's not enough.
attributes.name: Weedy

attributes.content: These pipelines go through Rhodes Island's power plant and propulsion systems. They aren't things you can redesign on a whim.
attributes.name: Weedy

attributes.content: Let's try some other methods to take care of this.
attributes.name: Weedy

attributes.content: Like, say... Wait, what's wrong? Why are you staring at me like that?
attributes.name: Weedy

attributes.content: Weedy... where were you just now?
attributes.name: Aroma

attributes.content: Huh? I just got back from the cafeteria.
attributes.name: Weedy

attributes.content: Were there a lot of people there, and you had to squeeze through the crowd?
attributes.name: Aroma

attributes.content: Yeah...
attributes.name: Weedy

attributes.content: Don't move. You have a lot of hair on your shoulders. It must be from other people's tails...
attributes.name: Aroma

attributes.content: Okay. I got it all.
attributes.name: Aroma

attributes.content: You don't look so good, Weedy...
attributes.name: Aroma

attributes.content: Hey, don't point that disinfectant spray gun at me like that.
attributes.name: Aroma

attributes.content: Sorry, Aroma!
attributes.name: Rubber

attributes.content: Okay... I got it. I'll do this pile of laundry.
attributes.name: Aroma

attributes.content: But isn't this is the third time this month...? We can't keep closing the laundry room for maintenance.
attributes.name: Aroma

attributes.content: So... did Engineering ever say what's behind it?
attributes.name: Aroma

attributes.content: This probably sounds silly, but...
attributes.name: Rubber

attributes.content: Actually, it's because the drainage pipes under the laundry machines keep getting clogged with hair. Every single one of them.
attributes.name: Rubber

attributes.content: I'll ask Engineering and see if there's any way the sewage system can be modified.
attributes.name: Aroma

attributes.content: Until it's completely fixed, we'll need to clean the laundry machines before we use them, every single time.
attributes.name: Aroma

attributes.content: I see... That's quite troublesome.
attributes.name: Roberta

attributes.content: Yeah... It's not a problem we can realistically solve completely, but I still want to figure out if there's any way to reduce the hair we need to clean up.
attributes.name: Aroma

attributes.content: Which is why I've been observing the operators while I'm working in different areas.
attributes.name: Aroma

attributes.content: And I realized that some people shed hair just from having it touch their zippers when closing them. And others carefully pull their tails from their pants before carefully grooming them every day.
attributes.name: Aroma

attributes.content: And it's not just tail hair, there's also head hair, ear hair, hair on the back of your necks... All of this gets on their clothes.
attributes.name: Aroma

attributes.content: Other than that, there are some who use lint rollers to remove the hair on their clothes before putting them in the laundry machines. If they notice me watching, they even give me an embarrassed smile...
attributes.name: Aroma

attributes.content: It was only after that that I realized... there's a much more important truth behind this crisis: a lot of operators are worried about their shedding.
attributes.name: Aroma

attributes.content: Although we've been trying to deal with the hair every day, we've never truly tried to take care of their worries.
attributes.name: Aroma

attributes.content: I... want to do something for them.
attributes.name: Aroma

attributes.content: So that's why you want to improve and promote this hydrotherapy machine... But I don't think that's going to be enough. We'll need a lot other ways to go about this, won't we?
attributes.name: Roberta

attributes.content: Yeah, absolutely.
attributes.name: Aroma

attributes.content: The cafeteria now has a couple of dishes that help with hair maintenance, and there will be even more choices in the future.
attributes.name: Aroma

attributes.content: Logistics is also going to introduce new shampoos that are formulated for the hair of different races, too.
attributes.name: Aroma

attributes.content: And the work I had scheduled for this afternoon was to check on the anti-static equipment in the storage room.
attributes.name: Aroma

attributes.content: ...Okay, Aroma.
attributes.name: Roberta

attributes.content: I now completely understand just how persistent you can be.
attributes.name: Roberta

attributes.content: Do you remember what we were discussing earlier?
attributes.name: Roberta

attributes.content: What...?
attributes.name: Aroma

attributes.content: When I apply makeup, I always look for the part of the face most worthy of jazzing up first. That's the most important part.
attributes.name: Roberta

attributes.content: And whether I leave it all to the auto-modelers or grab a makeup brush myself depends on the situation.
attributes.name: Roberta

attributes.content: Huh? What's with that response? Isn't that what you've been doing?
attributes.name: Roberta

attributes.content: Actually, I'm not really sure about that...
attributes.name: Aroma

attributes.content: I might have been thinking about it in a much simpler way... I just want to help solve a problem and make everyone's life better.
attributes.name: Aroma

attributes.content: I think that's what all of us Rhodes Island operators should be doing.
attributes.name: Aroma

attributes.content: ...Well, thanks to you, I just got a new design idea. What do you think about adding a hair dyeing module to the hydrotherapy machine?
attributes.name: Roberta

attributes.content: You mentioned in your report that there are a lot of people who aren't happy with their hair color...
attributes.name: Roberta

attributes.content: Anyway, I'm so glad we've got you around in Engineering now. No wonder Weedy's been taking such good care of you.
attributes.name: Roberta

attributes.content: What? Me, in Engineering...?
attributes.name: Aroma

attributes.content: Hold on...
attributes.name: Aroma

attributes.content: Aroma!
attributes.name: Rubber

attributes.content: Rubber? Why are you here...?
attributes.name: Aroma

attributes.content: H-He-Here are the laundry room's full specs, structural diagrams, and detailed usage statistics! I brought everything for you!
attributes.name: Rubber

attributes.content: I'm really sorry; I forgot all about it! I hope I didn't delay your R&D work with Engineering!
attributes.name: Rubber

attributes.content: Umm... Okay... but...
attributes.name: Aroma

attributes.content: I've already reassigned all your work at Logistics to our other operators!
attributes.name: Rubber

attributes.content: ...All my work? Huh?
attributes.name: Aroma

attributes.content: Yeah, that's right.
attributes.name: Rubber

attributes.content: No wonder my schedule this afternoon's so empty... but why?
attributes.name: Aroma

attributes.content: You see, we're planning a party at the cafeteria to celebrate you passing your evaluation period and formally joining Engineering!
attributes.name: Rubber

attributes.content: Be sure to head over once you're done talking with Roberta. You won't be disappointed!
attributes.name: Rubber

attributes.content: ...Is this some kind of misunderstanding? I'm not joining Engineering.
attributes.name: Aroma

attributes.content: Huh?
attributes.name: Rubber and Roberta

attributes.content: Starting next week, I'll be a formal member of the Logistics Department.
attributes.name: Aroma

attributes.content: So... you chose us?
attributes.name: Rubber

attributes.content: Yes.
attributes.name: Aroma

attributes.content: But aren't you participating in Roberta's seminars? And these schematics...
attributes.name: Rubber

attributes.content: Oh, that's actually for my work at Logistics.
attributes.name: Aroma

attributes.content: But... didn't the other departments invite you to join them?
attributes.name: Rubber

attributes.content: ...That was actually just Procurement.
attributes.name: Aroma

attributes.content: And it was only because my family's been sending lots of our workshop's shampoos here, so Procurement thought I had some kind of special channel for purchasing them...
attributes.name: Aroma

attributes.content: I haven't so much as dabbled in engineering before, and I definitely don't compare to the professionals here... I know I'm not cut out for it.
attributes.name: Aroma

attributes.content: It's okay, Aroma. Even if we're in different departments, you're welcome to come chat and work with me any time.
attributes.name: Roberta

attributes.content: No, scratch that... You absolutely need to come. I just realized there's a lip gloss that might be absolutely perfect on you.
attributes.name: Roberta

attributes.content: Anyway, this is all part of my research too... Ahem... Think about it, okay?
attributes.name: Roberta

attributes.content: O-Okay...
attributes.name: Aroma

attributes.content: So I got it all wrong.
attributes.name: Rubber

attributes.content: Thank goodness... I had no idea how I was going to explain this to the department chief.
attributes.name: Rubber

attributes.content: Huh? You're leaving already?
attributes.name: Aroma

attributes.content: I gotta share the good news with everybody! Maybe there's still time to switch the word 'Engineering' on the banner to 'Logistics'!
attributes.name: Rubber

attributes.content: *sigh*... Thinking about it, this is kinda a shame. Here I thought I was getting a new lackey I could count on.
attributes.name: Roberta

attributes.content: I'm sorry I didn't explain myself properly.
attributes.name: Aroma

attributes.content: It's okay. Nothing to worry about. Just leave the hydrotherapy machine's modifications to me.
attributes.name: Roberta

attributes.content: I mean, it's for everyone onboard Rhodes Island.
attributes.name: Roberta

attributes.content: ...Mm. Thank you.
attributes.name: Aroma

attributes.content: Right, you asked me earlier if I ever want to go back to Siracusa, to my hometown. I think... Once all my work is all over and I have time for a vacation, I might go and have a look.
attributes.name: Aroma

attributes.content: There were things I couldn't overcome before that I should be able to now. And I trust that that's how it is for Siracusa too.
attributes.name: Aroma

attributes.content: Sounds good. Maybe we could go together, even.
attributes.name: Roberta

attributes.content: I'm looking forward to it.
attributes.name: Aroma
